control_statement: Assign a business owner and model steward for every AI system.
evidence_required: System card with named owners; approval record

control_statement: Maintain an AI system inventory and keep it current.
Publish minimum AI use policy and acceptable use rules.
Document vendor model updates and internal prompt or policy changes.
Define intended use, out of scope use, and impact tier.
Document data sources and rights for training, tuning, retrieval.
Threat model prompt injection, tool abuse, and retrieval risks.
references: NIST AI RMF Map; NIST AI 600-1

control_statement: Define measurable acceptance criteria for task quality.
Run red team prompts for injection and data leakage.
references: NIST AI RMF Measure; NIST AI 600-1

control_statement: Monitor drift and guardrail hit rates over time.
Define response actions for threshold breaches.
Implement model or feature disablement path.
Generate audit ready evidence bundles on demand.
Assess model vendors for security, privacy, and update controls.
